no_account: You don't have an account. Create one
Once you create a new account please refresh the page.
install_supported_wallets: Please install one of the currently supported wallets.
insufficient_funds_dot: Insufficient funds to pay for DOT fees.
interbtc_bridge_loading: The interBTC bridge is loading. Please wait a few seconds.
issue_redeem_disabled: Issue and Redeem is currently disabled.
interbtc_bridge_recovery_mode: The interBTC bridge has entered recovery mode. User funds are safe. Please try again later or check the status on the Dashboard page.

redeem_page.sorry_redeem_failed: Sorry, your redeem request has failed
redeem_page.to_redeem_interbtc: To redeem your interBTC, you must now pick one of the two options:
redeem_page.must_select_account_warning: No account selected. Please select an account to redeem.
redeem_page.typically_takes: This typically takes only a few minutes but may sometimes take up to 6 hours.
redeem_page.we_will_inform_you_btc: We will inform you when the BTC payment is executed.
redeem_page.redeem_processed: Your Redeem request is being processed
redeem_page.error_in_parachain: You can't redeem interBTC at the moment because the interBTC bridge has encountered errors and recovering.
redeem_page.error_more_than_6_blocks_behind: You can't redeem interBTC at the moment because interBTC bridge is more than 6 blocks behind.
redeem_page.no_interbtc_to_redeem: You don't have any interBTC to redeem.
redeem_page.verify_and_confirm: Please verify and confirm your redeem request.
redeem_page.valid_btc_address: Please enter a valid BTC address (Supported: p2sh, p2pkh or p2wpkh in bech32 format).
redeem_page.enter_amount_interbtc: Please enter the amount of interBTC you want to redeem. A fee of {{redeemFee}}% will be subtracted.
redeem_page.current_balance: Please enter an amount smaller than your current balance:
redeem_page.amount_greater_dust_inclusion: Please enter an amount above the combined Bridge Fee, Bitcoin Network Fee, and Bitcoin Dust limit (
redeem_page.processed_by_vault: Your redeem request is being processed by Vault:
redeem_page.we_will_inform_you: We will inform you when your redeem request has been executed.
redeem_page.funds_safe: Don't worry - your funds are safe!
redeem_page.vault_did_not_send: The Vault did not send BTC to you on time. Don't worry - your funds are safe! You'll get
redeem_page.retry_again_and_get_compensation: A. Retry: Try again and get a {{amountDOT}} DOT compensation.
redeem_page.you_will_receive_dot: You can retry to redeem your BTC with another vault by opening a new redeem request. You will receive {{amountDOT}} DOT as compensation for the inconvenience.
redeem_page.reimburse_total: B. Reimburse: You will get a total of {{total}} DOT.
redeem_page.exchange_rate: for your {{amountPolkaBTC}} interBTC given the current exchange rate of {{rate}} BTC/DOT.
redeem_page.please_note: You will not receive any BTC if you reimburse.
redeem_page.redeem_against_selected_vault: You are executing a redeem against the under-collateralized vault {{shortAccount}}. You will receive a premium of {{premiumDot}} DOT for this redeem request
redeem_page.error_max_premium_redeem: Could not find Vault below premium redeem threshold with sufficient locked interBTC. Please try a different Vault. The maximum amount for premium redeem is {{maxPremiumRedeem}} interBTC.
redeem_page.compensation_notice: Your redeem request failed. You agreed to accept compensation and retry with another vault.
redeem_page.burn_notice: Your redeem request failed. You decided to burn interBTC in return for DOT.
redeem_page.retry_new_redeem: You can now create a new redeem request with another vault.
redeem_page.premium_redeem_info: If you select premium redeem, you will try to redeem with a vault that is below the secure collateral threshold. This operation has a higher risk since the vault might be liquidated. For this higher risk, you will receive a compensation.
redeem_page.vault_has_time_to_complete: The Vault has to complete the transaction in:

burn_page.burn_interbtc: Burn interBTC in exchange for DOT

vault.withdraw_your_collateral: You are requesting that your vault is replaced by other vaults in the system. If this is successful, you can withdraw your collateral.
vault.automatically_created: Your new BTC address will be automatically created from your BTC wallet connected to the vault client when you click update.
vault.tip_pending_btc: BTC volume of in-progress issue requests.
vault.tip_collateralization: Collateralization rate for locked BTC. 'Pending' includes in-progress issue requests.

issue_page.maximum_in_single_request: The maximum you can issue in a single request is {{maxAmount}} interBTC. Please enter a lower amount.
issue_page.contact_team: Contact the team for debugging if you think this is an error.
issue_page.you_did_not_send: You did not send the BTC transaction in time or transferred amount did not not meet the requested amount of interBTC.
issue_page.waiting_deposit: If you have already made the payment, please wait for a few minutes for it to be confirmed in the table below.
issue_page.fully_decentralized: interBTC is a fully decentralized system. Please make sure you send the right amount of BTC, we cannot guarantee that the vault will return the additional BTC that you sent by mistake.
issue_page.receive_interbtc_tokens: You will now receive your BTC-backed interBTC tokens. If this does not happen automatically within a few minutes, click the button below.
issue_page.must_select_account_warning: No account selected. Please select an account to proceed to issue interBTC.
issue_page.error_in_parachain: You can't issue interBTC at the moment because the Parachain has encountered errors and is recovering.
issue_page.error_more_than_6_blocks_behind: You can't issue interBTC at the moment because interBTC parachain is more than 6 blocks behind.
issue_page.enter-interbtc-amount-desc-1: Please enter the amount of interBTC you would like to issue.
issue_page.enter-interbtc-amount-desc-2: You will have to lock the amount of interBTC together with a small fee.
issue_page.enter-interbtc-amount-desc-3: Please enter an amount greater than the Bitcoin dust limit
issue_page.validation_max_value: The maximum amount you can issue (per request) on the testnet is 1.0 interBTC. Please enter a lower amount.
issue_page.validation_min_value: Please enter an amount greater than Bitcoin dust limit (
issue_page.proof_data: Fetching proof data for Bitcoin transaction: {{txId}}
issue_page.your_request_processed: Your request is now being processed.
issue_page.monitor_bitcoin: We will monitor Bitcoin for your transaction (via the transaction ID).
issue_page.sufficient_confirmations: Once it has sufficient confirmations, an "Execute" button will appear for this issue request.
issue_page.note_hour_to_confirm: Note: Your Bitcoin payment can take up to an hour to confirm.
issue_page.speed_things_up: Optional: inform us of your Bitcoin txid to speed things up
issue_page.required_message: Please enter the your btc transaction id
issue_page.verify_and_confirm: Please verify and confirm your issue request.
issue_page.issuing: You have requested to issue {{amountBTC}} interBTC, incurring a fee of 0 BTC. Please make the following Bitcoin payment as shown below within 24 hours.
issue_page.successful_completion: (This will be returned to you after successful completion of the request.)
issue_page.requested_to_mint: You have requested to mint {{amountBTC}} interBTC, incurring a fee of {{fee}} interBTC.
issue_page.following_payment: Please make the following Bitcoin payment as shown below
issue_page.exactly_one_payment: Please make exactly 1 payment for the exact specified amount. Otherwise, your request will not be processed and you will lose your funds.
issue_page.using_electrum: If you are using the Electrum desktop wallet, copy+paste this into the "Pay to" field.
issue_page.refund_sent_more_btc: Looks like you sent more BTC than requested.
issue_page.warning_mbtc_wallets: Warning: Some Bitcoin wallets display values in mBTC. Please ensure you send the correct amount:
issue_page.tooltip_bridge_fee: The bridge fee is paid to the Vaults, Relayers, and maintainers of the system.
issue_page.tooltip_security_deposit: The security deposit is a denial-of-service protection for Vaults that is refunded to you after the minting process is completed.

feedback.would_like_to_hear: We want to build the best-possible solution and would like to hear your feedback!
feedback.two_mins: It only takes 2 minutes of your time.

relayer.please_note: Please note there is a default waiting period before bonding.
relayer.warning_relayer_not_registered: Local relayer client running, but relayer is not yet registered with the parachain. The client is already submitting blocks, but voting and reporting features are disabled until registered.
relayer.note_you_can_deregister: Note: You can only deregister if you are not participating in a vote.
